projects.name: AYCO, Marketing Site
projects.summary: AYCO is a Goldman Sachs Company, and this project is a marketing site developed using Adobe AEM6 for the content pages and JavaScript, CSS3, Highcharts at the UI development.

projects.name: DAS (Digital Advertising Solutions) Campaign
projects.summary: Digital Advertising Solutions, Provides a range of services to the client, like Document Dropbox, Marketing Campaigns, Automated real time and marketing campaign Emails etc.

projects.name: GSAM (Goldman Sachs Assets Marketing)
projects.summary: Goldman Sachs Asset Management (GSAM) is one of the world’s leading investment managers. Across 33 offices worldwide, Goldman Sachs extend these global capabilities to the world’s leading pension plans, sovereign wealth funds, central banks, insurance companies, financial institutions, endowments, foundations, individuals and family offices, for whom it invest or advise on more than $1 trillion of assets.

projects.name: GSCIO-PE (Goldman Sachs CIO - Portfolio Explorer)
projects.summary: Goldman Sachs CIO Portfolio Explorer provides a detailed analysis of client portfolio and cash flows with the help of complex visualizations using various tables, graph and charts.

projects.name: GS-AIMS University
projects.summary: Goldman Sachs AIMS University provides a range of educational programs, courses, course modules, lessons, instructor courses, and quizzes. It keeps track of the users learning progress.

projects.name: GSCIO-AIMS (Goldman Sachs CIO - Alternate Investment Manager Selection)
projects.summary: The Alternative Investments & Manager Selection (“AIMS”) provides investors with investment and advisory solutions, across leading hedge fund managers, private equity funds, real estate managers, public equity strategies, fixed income strategies etc. .

projects.name: IMS (Insurance Management System)
projects.summary: Secure Vision's Insurance Management System (IMS), automates the key processes involved in providing multiple Insurance plans to its customers and experience to its users with user friendly subsystems. This also provides Secure Vision a platform to manage Insurance business and its clientele.

projects.name: MISMS (Multiple Installment Scheme Management System)
projects.summary: Secure Vision's MISMS (Multiple Installment Scheme Management System), automates the processes involved in managing Multiple Installment Scheme and experience to its users with user friendly subsystems.

projects.name: NAIP, Nematology Project
projects.summary: NAIP, a research project carried by division of Nematology, Indian Agricultural Research Institute (IARI), New Delhi. The project provides detailed information regarding its evolution, history, progress, deliverable, National Training,work allocations, expected outcomes, published papers, environmental and social issues, timelines etc..

projects.name: CBSE Learning
projects.summary: CBSE Learning was a public facing web site with authentication and authorization features, that provides authors and moderators to compose and publish Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE)'s learning materials like Sample Papers,  Question Papers, Chapters, latest CBSE news and events, Solved Questions from experts and many other features. This also provides administrator's desktop panel, that provides detailed information for analysis and administer. Public Users can register, login and access public and featured contents.

additionals.title: Successful POCs
bullets: POC done using D3 Charts and Angular js, the goal was to represent a complex data coming from multiple sources in a Multi branch Hierarchical custom charts and add interactivity to nodes.
POC done using Angular js, Moodle, Adobe Captivate, and Adobe AEM, the goal was to integrate all of these to create a Custom LMS for an existing Application.

POC done using Angular js, Gulp js, Bootstrap, Highcharts and DASH UI (a Goldman Sachs native Framework), the goal was to develop a Client Portfolio Explorer and Integrate DASH UI framework to have complex tables and charts.
POC done using Block Chain, Angular js, Node js and Bootstrap, the goal was to implement multiple node servers and develop a lending application using Block Chain.

POC done using Adobe Campaign, the goal was to write and introduce a JavaScript in between the Marketing Campaign Workflow, which processes Lakhs of prospects in batches and recreates them with additional data based on some business rules.
POC done using jekyll, liquid templates, and Adobe Campaign, the goal was to automate the email content creation for Adobe Campaign.
POC done using react and redux, the goal was to integrate and implement new modules with react components, redux store in existing complex, JavaScript Module Pattern Project.
POC done using intro.js, Angular js, the goal was to develop an interactive step by step help tutorial for an existing project.
